title: REWIND: Chris Evans (feat. Chris Evans)
description:
Happy New Year, Thirst Buckets! 
As you probably know, in 2019 we found a new home for our podcast at Slate. Since then, we’ve lusted out loud over quite a few of our favorite thirst objects. And you thirsted with us!
To celebrate, we’re sharing a few of our favorite Thirst Aid Kit episodes from over the years. And the first episode we’re throwing it back to is REALLY a celebration… it's called Chris Evans, featuring Chris Evans himself.
Enjoy, and we’ll be back with some brand new thirsting in a few weeks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Happy New Year, Thirst Buckets! 

As you probably know, in 2019 we found a new home for our podcast at Slate. Since then, we’ve lusted out loud over quite a few of our favorite thirst objects. And you thirsted with us!

To celebrate, we’re sharing a few of our favorite Thirst Aid Kit episodes from over the years. And the first episode we’re throwing it back to is REALLY a celebration… it's called Chris Evans, featuring Chris Evans himself.

Enjoy, and we’ll be back with some brand new thirsting in a few weeks.
